attributes.action: Give all college students in the UK free bus passes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: alot of students currently studying in colleges in the UK are finding it difficult to travel back and for their place of education because there college has not given them a right to a free bus pass.  With this resession, alot of familys are tight with money. i hope that if this petition is read through by our PM, that he will gove all students the right to a free bus pass, inturn this will save money for the familys and students alowing them to spend there money on things that will benifit their education.
